description: Explore the world of Artificial Intelligence, including its fundamental concepts, techniques, and applications in various domains. This category covers introductory to advanced topics in AI.

Delve into Machine Learning, a subset of AI focused on building algorithms that learn from and make predictions based on data. Courses in this category cover a range of machine learning techniques and tools.
Learn about Data Science, which involves extracting insights and knowledge from data through various methods, including data analysis, visualization, and statistical techniques.
Understand Deep Learning, a specialized area within Machine Learning that involves neural networks with many layers. This category focuses on advanced techniques and applications of deep learning.

Explore Natural Language Processing (NLP), a field of AI focused on the interaction between computers and human language. Courses cover techniques for text processing, sentiment analysis, and language generation.

Dive into Computer Vision, which enables computers to interpret and process visual information from the world. This category includes topics on image processing, object detection, and face recognition.
